翪字的基本解释

翪
zōng
扇动翅膀上下飞。

翪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
［《廣韻》作孔切，上董，精。］
鸟飞时振翅上下。

翪字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页958第21
【廣韻】子紅切【集韻】祖叢切，?音騣。【玉篇】竦翅飛也。亦作㚇。【爾雅·釋鳥】鵲鵙醜，其飛也翪。【註】竦翅上下。　又【廣韻】【正韻】作孔切【集韻】【韻會】祖動切，?音總。義同。　又【集韻】【正韻】?作弄切，音粽。義同。

翪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
翪字的起名意思

暂无。

uneven flight of a bird
Basic explanation of words
uneven flight of a bird
zōng
Flap your wings and fly up and down.
uneven flight of a bird
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
["Guangyun" made Kongqie, Shangdong, Jing. ]
The bird flaps its wings up and down when it flies.
uneven flight of a bird
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [The Department of Yu Zi] 　翪; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: Page 958 and 21
[Guang Yun] Zihong cut [Ji Yun] Ancestral Cong cut,? Yin Xie. 【Jade articles】Flying with wings. Also made 㚇. 【Erya·Shu Niao】The magpie is ugly, and its flying is also long. [Note] Up and down the wings.　 [Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] made Kongqi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Hui] The ancestor moved and cut,? The total sound. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Play tricks, sound dumplings. The same meaning.
